pullRequest.title: Use proper package for @MongoClientName
pullRequest.bodyText:
For now we just deprecate the old one annotation and support both
Relates to: #11568 (comment)

nodes.bodyText: You're missing the end of the WARNING.
I think we should improve this Javadoc.
